'''Fertile Ash Adventurer''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sacred Mountain's Fading Glow]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]] and [[Atocpan]].
